コンストラクタの詳細

UnitClauses

public UnitClauses(IVecInt values)
メソッドの詳細

assertConstraint

public void assertConstraint(UnitPropagationListener s)
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Method called when the constraint is to be asserted. It means that the constraint was learned during the search and it should now propagate some truth values. In the clausal case, only one literal should be propagated. In other cases, it might be different.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の assertConstraint
パラメータ:
s - a UnitPropagationListener to use for unit propagation.

assertConstraintIfNeeded

public void assertConstraintIfNeeded(UnitPropagationListener s)
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Method called when the constraint is added to the solver "on the fly". In that case, the constraint may or may not have to propagate some literals, unlike the Constr.assertConstraint(UnitPropagationListener) method.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の assertConstraintIfNeeded
パラメータ:
s - a UnitPropagationListener to use for unit propagation.

calcReason

public void calcReason(int p,
                       IVecInt outReason)
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Compute the reason for a given assignment. If the constraint is a clause, it is supposed to be either a unit clause or a falsified one. It is expected that the falsification of the constraint has been detected as soon at is occurs (e.g. using Propagatable.propagate(UnitPropagationListener, int).

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の calcReason
パラメータ:
p - a satisfied literal (or Lit.UNDEFINED)
outReason - the list of falsified literals whose negation is the reason of the assignment of p to true.

getActivity

public double getActivity()
インタフェース IConstr の記述:
To obtain the activity of the constraint.

定義:
インタフェース IConstr 内の getActivity
戻り値:
the activity of the clause.

public void incActivity(double claInc)
インタフェース Constr の記述:

インタフェース Constr 内の incActivity

locked

public boolean locked()
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Indicate wether a constraint is responsible from an assignment.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の locked
戻り値:
true if a constraint is a "reason" for an assignment.

インタフェース Constr 内の setLearnt

simplify

public boolean simplify()
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Simplifies a constraint, by removing top level falsified literals for instance.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の simplify
戻り値:
true iff the constraint is satisfied and can be removed from the database.

forwardActivity

public void forwardActivity(double claInc)
定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の forwardActivity

canBePropagatedMultipleTimes

public boolean canBePropagatedMultipleTimes()
インタフェース IConstr の記述:
Partition constraints into the ones that only propagate once (e.g. clauses and cardinality constraints) and the ones that can be propagated several times (e.g. pseudo-boolean constraints).

定義:
インタフェース IConstr 内の canBePropagatedMultipleTimes
戻り値:
true if the constraint can propagate literals at different decision levels.

calcReasonOnTheFly

public void calcReasonOnTheFly(int p,
                               IVecInt trail,
                               IVecInt outReason)
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Compute the reason for a given assignment in a the constraint created on the fly in the solver. Compared to the method Constr.calcReason(int, IVecInt), the falsification may not have been detected as soon as possible. As such, it is necessary to take into account the order of the literals in the trail.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の calcReasonOnTheFly
パラメータ:
p - a satisfied literal (or Lit.UNDEFINED)
trail - all the literals satisfied in the solvers, should not be modified.
outReason - a list of falsified literals whose negation is the reason of the assignment of p to true.

propagatePi

public void propagatePi(MandatoryLiteralListener m)

canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals

public boolean canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals()
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Check that a specific constraint can be checked for satisfiability by simply counting its number of satisfied literals. This is the case for clauses and cardinality constraints. It is not the case for pseudo boolean constraints.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals
戻り値:
true iff the constraints can be satisfied by satisfying a given number of literals;

requiredNumberOfSatisfiedLiterals

public int requiredNumberOfSatisfiedLiterals()
インタフェース Constr の記述:
Returns the number of literals necessary to satisfy that constraint. That method only make sense if the Constr.canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals() returns true. For clauses, the value returned will be 1. For cardinality constraints, the value returned will be its degree.

定義:
インタフェース Constr 内の requiredNumberOfSatisfiedLiterals
戻り値:
the number of literals
